PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-05602015-05-04PS,  ,  ,  , 
ActFirearms Act
SubjectOrder Amending the United States Enforcement Officers Exemption Order (Marine Transportation of Firearms)
PrecisOrder Amending the UNITED STATES ENFORCEMENT OFFICERS EXEMPTION ORDER (MARINE TRANSPORTATION OF FIREARMS) in order to provide temporary authority for the United States Coast Guard and United States Customs and Border Protection enforcement officers, and vessels to transit through specific locations in Canadian waters with duty weapons, and, in limited circumstances, with deck-mounted machine guns due to marine geographic inhibitors for the purpose of carrying out their duties without contravening the Firearms Act and certain provisions in the Criminal Code.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
